name: Don Jose - Natural - San Marco
additionalNotes: Grown in the volcanic rich soils of Honduras, Don Jose cigars are handmade using the same techniques used by rollers in conquistador times. This Cuban-seed, 100% long filler classic features a medium to full-bodied taste boasting notes of cream and coffee throughout. With over 100 years of J.C. Newman history behind the Don Jose name, these Nicaraguan handmades are priced to sell. All six sizes come in both natural and maduro, providing an array of options without compromising value.
